plot: Two youngsters from rival New York City gangs fall in love, but tensions between their respective friends build toward tragedy.
title: West Side Story
writer: Ernest Lehman (screenplay), Arthur Laurents (book), Jerome Robbins (play)
actors: Natalie Wood, Richard Beymer, Russ Tamblyn, Rita Moreno

plot: A British team is sent to cross occupied Greek territory and destroy the massive German gun emplacement that commands a key sea channel.
title: The Guns of Navarone
writer: Alistair MacLean (novel), Carl Foreman (written for the screen by)
actors: Gregory Peck, David Niven, Anthony Quinn, Stanley Baker

plot: The fabled Spanish hero Rodrigo Diaz (a.k.a. El Cid) overcomes a family vendetta and court intrigue to defend Christian Spain against the Moors.
title: El Cid
writer: Fredric M. Frank (story), Philip Yordan (screenplay), Fredric M. Frank (screenplay), Ben Barzman (screenplay)
awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 8 wins & 8 nominations.
actors: Charlton Heston, Sophia Loren, Raf Vallone, Geneviève Page

plot: A college professor invents an anti-gravity substance which a corrupt businessman wants for himself.
title: The Absent-Minded Professor
awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 3 wins & 3 nominations.
actors: Fred MacMurray, Nancy Olson, Keenan Wynn, Tommy Kirk

plot: Identical twins, separated at birth and each raised by one of their biological parents, discover each other for the first time at summer camp and make a plan to bring their wayward parents back together.
title: The Parent Trap
writer: Erich Kästner (book), David Swift (screenplay), Nancy Meyers (screenplay), Charles Shyer (screenplay)
actors: Lindsay Lohan, Dennis Quaid, Natasha Richardson, Elaine Hendrix

plot: A series of stories following a week in the life of a philandering paparazzo journalist living in Rome.
title: La Dolce Vita
writer: Federico Fellini (story), Ennio Flaiano (story), Tullio Pinelli (story), Federico Fellini (screenplay), Ennio Flaiano (screenplay), Tullio Pinelli (screenplay), Brunello Rondi (contributing writer)
actors: Marcello Mastroianni, Anita Ekberg, Anouk Aimée, Yvonne Furneaux

plot: A series of misunderstandings leaves an advertising executive with a campaign for a product which has not been invented yet while he romances his rival in the guise of its inventor.
title: Lover Come Back
awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 4 wins & 2 nominations.
actors: Rock Hudson, Doris Day, Tony Randall, Edie Adams

title: King of Kings
awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 nomination.
actors: Jeffrey Hunter, Siobhan McKenna, Hurd Hatfield, Ron Randell

plot: Jakob Stegelmann reviews the theatrical re-release of One Hundred and One Dalmatians (1961) and looks at dogs featured in Disney's live action and animated films. Also review of the video ...
title: One Hundred and One Dalmatians
actors: Jakob Stegelmann, Charles Haid, Tom Hanks, Clint Rowe
